Package helper.dbaccess

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.dbaccess.DBConnection
  • public abstract class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that consists of only static members and is not meant to be instantiated. This class is used to interface with the MYSQL database for this application. It can open and close a connection, as well as return the connection for the other helper.dbaccess classes.
    See Also:
    DBAppointment, DBContact, DBCountry, DBCustomer, DBDivision, DBUser

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  DBConnection.ConnectionNotOpen
      The exception that is raised when the connection is not open when getConnection is clled

      • openConnection

        public static boolean openConnection()
        Opens the connection, and returns true if successful, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        whether the connection was successfully opened.

      • closeConnection

        public static void closeConnection()

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                         throws DBConnection.ConnectionNotOpen
        Grabs the connection so that work can be done.
        Returns:
        the Connection to the MYSQL database.
        Throws:
        DBConnection.ConnectionNotOpen - if the connection has not yet been opened.
